set_metapar(**kwargs)[source]
class FRB_params(name: str = 'FRBXXXXXX', RA: str = '00:00:00.0000', DEC: str = '00:00:00.0000', DM: float = 0.0, bw: int = 336, cfreq: float = 1271.5, t_lim=[0.0, 3100.0], f_lim=[0.0, 336.0], RM: float = 0.0, f0: float | None = None, pa0: float = 0.0, t_crop=[0.0, 1.0], f_crop=[0.0, 1.0], tN: int = 1, fN: int = 1, fW=None, tW=None, norm: str = 'max', czap=None, EMPTY=False)[source]

FRB parameter structure

##==== parameters ====## name: name of FRB RA: Right ascension DEC: Declination DM: Dispersion Measure bw: Bandwidth (MHz) cfreq: Central Frequency (MHz)

t_lim: Time bounds (ms) f_lim: Frequency bounds (MHz) dt: delta time (ms) df: delta frequency (MHz) nchan: Number of channels nsamp: Number of samples

UP: Upper bandwidth
